Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/4/1986 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 6/9/1987, off Dennis Rasmussen (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/1987, off David Cone (KC)...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 6/1/1989...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,078,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/1990, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
